Title: Kinect Tilt Control
Description: Kinect Tilt Control is a simple application to tilt (i.e. move up and down, or rotate vertically) your Kinect v1 sensor.
HomeWiki:
Project Description

Kinect Tilt Control is a simple application to tilt (i.e. move up and down, or rotate vertically) your Kinect v1 sensor.
It will only work with the Kinect v1 sensor, and only with the first Kinect in the system.

Kinect Tilt Control runs on the .NET Framework 4 Client Profile.

The application resides in the system tray, and can be configured to set a specified tilt on application startup and shutdown.




P.S. KinectTiltControl.exe is recognized as HEUR/QVM03.0.0000.Malware.Gen by the 360 Total Security antivirus. This is a false positive determined by their heuristics (I already submitted a false positive report on their website).
